page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: As this area is mainly urban, there are many schools. Chaddesden alone has 26 schools including nurseries. {4 Secondary}(11-14,14-18 or 11-18 yrs) {8 Junior }( 7-11 yrs. ) {8 Infant }( 5-7 yrs. ) {1 Primary }( 4+-11 yrs. ) {1 Nursery }( 3-5 yrs. ) {2 Day Nurseries }(0-5 yrs.) {2 Special Schools}(7-11 and 2-19 yrs.) There are no privately owned schools in this area of Derby. One infant and junior school is Roman Catholic. All the schools have hard play areas and recreation fields for games. They all have hot meals cooked on the premises.(45p in 1985) Most needed additional temporary classrooms during the 1960s and 1970s. However, with the falling rolls of the early 1980s, many are now resource centres, libraries, art or drama rooms.
